item.title: More Ancient Egyptian Granite Vases Analyzed!
item.itunes:title: More Ancient Egyptian Granite Vases Analyzed! More STL's available
item.itunes:author: UnchartedX
item.itunes:subtitle: More Ancient Egyptian Granite Vases Analyzed!
item.itunes:summary: Astonishing Results! More Ancient Egyptian Granite Vases Analyzed! More STL's available
item.description: Ancient precision confirmed! The last few months has been a busy time for the vase scan team. Led by Chris Dunn, Alex Dunn and Nick Sierra, the team gathered in a precision lab in Danville IL to do a hands-on metrology inspection of several vases. Not only that, but many more of the remarkable ancient, hard stone vases that come from pre-dynastic and early dynastic ancient Egypt have been scanned via structured light and CT-Xray, and the results are frankly astonishing. Not only has the incredible precision results of the original vase been confirmed in other artifacts, geometric and mathematical analysis has shown shared design principles between multiple vases - the same radial traversal function, the same fixed mathematical ratio between curvatures, and the same depth of elegance in the extensive use of pi and phi.
